issue.title: Model for left arm is wrong in v4 (and has always been wrong)

content.raw: The arms on v5 are identical except for the wryx,wry2, and wry joint/links which are of course completely different.  The electric forearms are much more symmetric than the upper arm links, so one should only need to apply the above non-wrx/y changes to v5, and just leave the electric forearms as is, ie, symmetric.
content.html: The arms on v5 are identical except for the wryx,wry2, and wry joint/links which are of course completely different. The electric forearms are much more symmetric than the upper arm links, so one should only need to apply the above non-wrx/y changes to v5, and just leave the electric forearms as is, ie, symmetric.
